@ConroeBrooks @Dianaseamon1 This hurts so much to hear. Iâ€™m sorry that people canâ€™t recognize generosity & talent. Iâ€™m grateful to anyone who takes the time after a grueling performance to do the stagedoor. You donâ€™t owe us this, and are certainly justified in choosing to take care of yourself instead.

@ConroeBrooks I just took my friend to see Hamilton (my 8th time), and what she talked about more than anything was the amazing ensemble work. The energy, the talent, the non-stoppedness of each member. You all are why Iâ€™ll see TheSkitâ„¢ï¸ 3 more times when you grace my hometown, Durham.
